review: Seemed like a great value when it came out. I pre-ordered it and received it in December I think. The idea is great, however the execution is poor. My main complaint is that the device is not engineered well. It constantly over-heats, has to be power-cycled, and has stutter in it's video. I have 2 media players from another well-known brand, and they continue to work flawlessly year after year. This device however, is more headache then it's worth.
